review_text: I purchased the CIM-22PC (a similar model) from Costco.  Be aware that key plastic parts (the lid and mixing arm) are not dishwasher safe.  In our case, they warped in the dishwasher and rendered the entire machine unusable.  Cuisinart should have used dishwasher-safe plastic.
summary: Plastic parts are NOT dishwasher safe!
product_name: Cuisinart ICE-20 Automatic 1-1/2-Quart Ice Cream Maker, White
